scripts.report: node -e "if(process.env.TRAVIS){}else{process.exit(1)}" && codeclimate-test-reporter < coverage/lcov.info || echo skip coverage report
scripts.release:browserify: cd release && browserify ../src --transform babelify --standalone YourModuleName --debug | exorcist your-module-name.js.map -b . > your-module-name.js
scripts.release:uglifyjs: cd release && uglifyjs your-module-name.js --in-source-map your-module-name.js.map --mangle --compress --output your-module-name.min.js --source-map your-module-name.min.js.map
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
